content: Latin Gospel-Book; containing Barking, List of Lands
binding: Soft bound, s. xvii (?) in polished white leather. Sewn on three thongs. Remains of two pins on upper cover.
accompanying: Fols. i, 197 are modern paper flyleaves, contemporary with the binding. Fols. ii, iii are a vellum bifolium introduced into the manuscript by Batman.

history.provenance: The records on fol. 196v are most likely to have been added at Barking Nunnery.
history.acquisition: Acquired by the Bodleian before 1602, probably from Sir Walter Cope (1553?-1614).
